If there's one place that Master Thief Teriel avoids at all costs, it's the
prison island of Peh. But when a daring heist takes an unexpected turn
Teriel finds himself shackled on an airship bound for the infamous island
To make matters worse, the daemon inside his head makes it very clear that
the thief will never leave unless he does exactly what he's told

2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
